name: Shop Keep
description:
A short Clicker game that also uses a crafting system and elements of shop management. 

You find a cave one day, full of dangers and monsters. Where others might think to venture forth and plunder it's riches, instead an idea plops into your head: Why not open a shop and profit from other idiot adventurers that want to delve deep into the dungeon. 

And so your legend begins. Not one of might and honor, but one of profits and Success!

Caution: The game is still in development and this is only a bare prototype of the final product. Still, i hope you enjoy my work! :)
